name: Shooter Rabbit 2D
description: Shooter Rabbit 2D is a fun endless shooter survival game where you play as a cute little bunny rabbit with a gun. Your main objective is to kill as many enemies as possible before you run out of lives and bullets. You can replenish your lives and bullets as time goes on, but you have to survive in order to do that. The more times you replenish your lives, the more your chances of scoring high.
